summary: Each tab have its own colorscheme
name: tabpagecolorscheme
description:
Each tab have its own colorscheme, using :Tcolorscheme command which acts as :colorscheme

* http://github.com/ujihisa/tabpagecolorscheme (development)

It's handy when you also use unite-colorscheme.
install_details: Just copy the file into your &rtp dir.

versions.release_notes: * added a use-cpo-save mechanism* stopped multiple inclusions* added color scheme completion* wrapped the auto-commands up into a auto-command group* allow the command to be called w/o any arguments so it would display the current colorscheme just like the :colo command does* shorten the command name* (Thanks Peter Rincker!)
